keyMoments.title: Sabo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Sabo is introduced as a 10-year-old blond boy who works with Ace, robbing thieves and pirates around Gray Terminal to save money for their dream of becoming pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The debut of Sabo, the third member of the ASL brothers, marking the beginning of one of One Piece's most emotional character arcs.
keyMoments.quote: Did you get the treasure, Ace?

keyMoments.title: Debates Killing Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sabo and Ace debate whether they should kill Luffy to protect their treasure secret, though neither has killed before and doesn't know how to proceed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sabo's moral conflict between survival and his fundamental inability to kill an innocent child.
keyMoments.quote: What should we do? We've never killed anyone before...

keyMoments.title: Recognizes Luffy's Loyalty
keyMoments.description: Sabo realizes that Luffy has been tortured for hours but hasn't revealed their treasure location, earning his respect and trust.
keyMoments.significance: The moment Sabo accepts Luffy as worthy of friendship and trust, laying the foundation for their brotherhood.
keyMoments.quote: He didn't tell them anything. Even after all that...

keyMoments.title: Defeats Porchemy with Ace
keyMoments.description: Sabo and Ace work together to defeat Porchemy and rescue Luffy from captivity.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sabo's combat ability and his willingness to fight for his friends.

relationships.description: Sabo is Ace's partner and best friend, working together to steal treasure and save money for their dream of becoming pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Sabo and Ace are shown working as a team, stealing from pirates and protecting their shared treasure.

relationships.description: Initially suspicious of Luffy after he discovers their treasure, Sabo comes to respect and befriend him after witnessing his unwavering loyalty during torture.

evolutionMoments.description: Sabo's opinion of Luffy transforms from seeing him as a threat to recognizing him as a loyal friend worthy of rescue.

reveals.information: A 10-year-old boy who lives in Gray Terminal and works with Ace as a thief
Saving treasure with Ace to become pirates and sail away from Goa Kingdom

keyMoments.title: Porchemy's Debut
keyMoments.description: Porchemy appears as a large, violent member of the Bluejam Pirates, searching for those who stole from his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the episode's antagonist who will torture Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: I found you! You're the ones who stole from the Bluejam Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Captures Luffy
keyMoments.description: Porchemy successfully captures young Luffy while Ace and Sabo escape.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the torture sequence that defines Luffy's character.

keyMoments.title: Tortures Luffy
keyMoments.description: Porchemy brutally tortures 10-year-old Luffy with a mallet and spiked gloves for hours, trying to extract the location of the stolen treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Creates one of the darkest scenes in One Piece, showing Porchemy's cruelty and Luffy's incredible willpower.
keyMoments.quote: Tell me where the treasure is, or I'll beat you to death!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Ace and Sabo
keyMoments.description: Porchemy is defeated by the combined efforts of Ace and Sabo when they rescue Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Ends Porchemy's threat and completes the rescue mission.

reveals.information: A violent member of the Bluejam Pirates known for his brutality
Uses weapons like mallets and spiked gloves for torture and combat

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Mentioned
keyMoments.description: Bluejam is mentioned as the captain of the Bluejam Pirates who operate in Gray Terminal.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bluejam as a future antagonist and the main criminal force in Gray Terminal.

reveals.information: Captain of the Bluejam Pirates, a crew operating in Gray Terminal

keyMoments.title: Discovers Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: Young Luffy (age 10) discovers Gray Terminal while searching for Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's first encounter with the harsh reality of social inequality in Goa Kingdom.
keyMoments.quote: What is this place? It's full of trash!

keyMoments.title: Discovers Secret Treasure Stash
keyMoments.description: Luffy accidentally finds Ace and Sabo's hidden treasure while following them.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the conflict that will test Luffy's loyalty.
keyMoments.quote: So this is where you've been hiding all that treasure!

keyMoments.title: Endures Torture Without Breaking
keyMoments.description: Despite hours of brutal torture by Porchemy with mallets and spiked gloves, 10-year-old Luffy refuses to reveal Ace and Sabo's treasure location.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most defining moments of Luffy's character, establishing his incredible willpower and loyalty to friends. This scene becomes legendary as one of the darkest in One Piece.
keyMoments.quote: I don't know anything about any treasure!

relationships.description: Luffy earns Ace's respect by refusing to betray him despite torture.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace witnesses Luffy's loyalty and decides to rescue him from Porchemy.

relationships.description: Luffy earns Sabo's respect through his unwavering loyalty during torture.

evolutionMoments.description: Sabo's opinion of Luffy transforms from distrust to deep respect after witnessing his loyalty.

reveals.information: Demonstrates incredible willpower and loyalty, refusing to betray friends even under brutal torture

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Robs Bluejam Pirates
keyMoments.description: 13-year-old Ace successfully steals treasure from members of the Bluejam Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's skills as a thief and his partnership with Sabo.

keyMoments.title: Debates Killing Luffy
keyMoments.description: Ace and Sabo tie Luffy to a tree and debate whether to kill him to protect their treasure secret.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's initial ruthlessness tempered by his inability to actually kill an innocent child.

keyMoments.title: Recognizes Luffy's Loyalty
keyMoments.description: Ace realizes Luffy has endured hours of torture without revealing their secret, earning his deep respect.
keyMoments.significance: The turning point where Ace accepts Luffy as worthy of friendship.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Porchemy with Sabo
keyMoments.description: Ace and Sabo work together to defeat Porchemy and rescue Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's combat ability and his willingness to fight for his friends.

relationships.description: Ace's best friend and partner in their life as thieves in Gray Terminal.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace and Sabo are shown as close partners who work together to steal treasure and protect their shared dreams.

relationships.description: Initially sees Luffy as a nuisance, but comes to respect him after witnessing his loyalty.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace's opinion of Luffy changes from annoyance to respect after seeing his unwavering loyalty under torture.

reveals.information: As a 13-year-old, Ace lived in Gray Terminal and worked as a thief with Sabo
